name: Bill Shillito
description: '''William "Bill" James Robert Shillito''' (born March 26, 1986), more commonly known as '''DM Ashura''', is an [[electronic music]] remixer, producer, and composer whose work can be found in the [[music video game|music game]]s ''O2Jam'', ''[[Dance Dance Revolution]]'', ''[[beatmania IIDX]]'', ''[[StepMania]]'', ''Flash Flash Revolution'', and ''[[Pump It Up (video game)|Pump it Up]]''.
